bulletpoints.point_data: Contracted to Hire via Net2Source & FirstPro (04/07/2022 to 11/08/2022), converted to full time.
Performed full stack development in a .Net environment, including web Applications, console applications, and cloud applications.
Lead a team of 4 Developers and assisted in managing teams of 3rd party contractors.
Managed over 20 projects using the Atlassian product suite (BitBucket, JIRA, Confluence).
Handled majority of support tickets coming in for our Team, delegating some of them to junior members.
Handled basic administration tasks and ticket requests for the Intranet Hub and MyMedPayment.com using Sitecore's admin suite.
Developed applications using the OutSystems PaaS cloud environment.
Developed and maintained various FACS external .aspx pages.
Modernized various background services/console applications as well as handled their migration & deployment for server upgrades.
Assisted in documentation, cleanup, and organization.
Managed and assisted in migrating servers and databases involving our payment processing web portal into clouded environments - Azure & Sharepoint.
Lead the migration of our Intranet from on premise servers to our Sharepoint host, including file migration and Active Directory integration.
Developed, maintained, and enhanced classic/modern sharepoint sites, pages, and lists.
Developed custom JavaScript for various advanced operations and business rules.
Handled Intranet (Sharepoint) related support tickets and issues.
Utilized Node, Yeoman, React, PNPjs, TypeScript/SASS, and Visual Studio Code for development and deployment.
Maintenance, Page development, and Data Entry for FEMA's Drupal site - https://wecandothis.hhs.gov/.
Developed and deployed an internal .Net Portal using ASP, C# and MVC responsible for handling internal forms and ticket requests.
Performed Full Stack technical analysis and support for a variety of applications.
Full Stack .Net Cloud development for a Community Corrections web application.
Reviewed tickets and specific issues with the QA team, handling the bugs and/or delegating to the offshore dev team.
Acted as liaison with offshore development team.
Handled Dev Ops for QA and UAT stages with Microsoft Azure services.
Performed basic maintenance, enhancements, and deployments for a .Net ASP/C# WebForms CRM product.
Inherited control and ownership of a legacy .Net ASP/VB WebForms warehouse management application.
Handled all support related issues, communicating directly with customers, Stephen Gould representatives, and warehouse management.
Developed major features for the warehouse management product in a modular fashion for feature-based sales/add-ons.
Cleaned up old background maintenance/reporting services and implemented robust new ones.
Rebuilt a Prize Code GiveAway product built in .Net ASP/C# WebForms.
Lead and trained entry level developers in .Net, SQL, clean coding, OO, and Agile practices, etc.
Developed and deployed desktop applications in .Net for clients based off of specification sheets.
Helped bring a project to meet a targeted deadline – A trade web application built in JSP, hosted by Tomcat.
Primarily worked on a financial ratings web application that used HTML for the front end and Java/MongoDB for the backend.
Built out a small suite of tools for basic office management.
Assisted in development of a major asset management product.
Developed various parts of ServiceNow (Sandbox → Dev → UAT → Production)
Developed UI Policies, Data Policies, Client Scripts, and UI Actions.
Created a GWT Web Application from scratch.
Performed manual testing, debugging, and functionality enhancement on a new web application.
Created two Android Demos and one Android Prototype.
Bench-marked and assisted in testing a website in development. (Existing product version upgrade)
Led and organized project and code documentation efforts.
Trained the intern in basic C# and OO Principles.
Designed and built utility projects to speed up development.
Redesigned and cleaned existing projects.
Research and development – Benchmarking various databases such as MS SQL and Oracle.
Used Exigen''s OpenL framework to parse tables built in MS Excel to create various business rules (insurance policy ratings) for the backend of an N-tier layered web application.
Tested and Modified existing OpenL formatted spreadsheets according to given requirements.
Used Java for test case automation and performing unit test cases in combination with Exigen''s WebStudio web application (Hosted by Tomcat).
Led and trained a team of 6 in Java's J2SE framework.
Worked on a 3 layered project in Java that consists of a General Purpose Backend Library, Module Package, and a Modular Calculator.
Responsible for business and management website design, construction, and management using WordPress, JQuery, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP (mySQL database).
Trained students with the basics of the Java J2SE and/or .Net C# platform.
Trained students with Java executable Jar file and/or C# .exe deployment.
Worked on ServiceNow's front end implementation to create business and validation rules, as well as tables, widgets, etc.
Created .Net ASP webpages for various clients, using .Net VB code behind that accessed a SQL database. These pages served as a temporary service until the ServiceNow migration was completed.
